title: (x) The World's Favorite Game - custom face for Carlsberg by Kontrapunkt {Rasmus Michaëlis}
content:
It's sooooo on the tip of my tongue, but I can't quite match the name with the face.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012181022im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture_4_4624.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture\_4.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012181022/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture_4_0.png) | 64.39 KB |
author: kalanigee

comments.content: It's a custom typeface for Carlsberg, made by Kontrapunkt. See the case [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012181022/http:/www.kontrapunkt.com/en/cases/signage/carlsberg-group/) and [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012181022/http:/www.kontrapunkt.dk/en/news/recent/creative-circle-gold-award/)
